content.text:
I'm personally drifting toward the idea that Android is a lost cause, and that the new generation of mobile Linux devices (like the Librem 5) are going to make it obsolete. With that said, I've got a fine setup going so far:

- Email: FastMail
- Contacts: FastMail
- Calendar: FastMail
- OSM: Maps.me and OSMAnd+
- Term: None, I've just been doing my computing on my laptop.
- Other: I use (and love!) Syncthing and can't recommend it enough. I'm running a Raspberry Pi connected to a 1 TB hard drive and I have all of my photos and videos auto-synced as soon as I take them.
